addin.name: Mauerfall
addin.description:
November 9th, 1989. The Berlin Wall falls as the DDR relents to the growing protests sweeping the East, allowing free passage to the West and paving the way to to a unified Germany the following year. Standing for almost 30 years, the wall

November 9th, 2009. At 20.05 almost 1,000 dominos, each individually decorated by Berlin students, will fall through the city centre, in celebration of the 20 year anniversary of this momentous occasion. This level brings this commemoration to the World of Goo.
